select o.*, b.book_name, c.chapter_name, u.username, u.nickname from novl_consumption o left join novl_book b on o.book_id = b.id left join novl_chapter c on o.chapter_id = c.id left join novl_user u on o.user_id = u.id where 1 = 1
and o.consume_order_no = #{consumeOrderNo}
and exists (select 1 from novl_user u1 where u1.username = #{username} and o.user_id = u1.id)
and exists (select 1 from novl_book b1 where b1.book_name ILIKE #{pattern} and o.book_id = b1.id)

select o.*, b.book_name, c.chapter_name, c.chapter_number, u.username from novl_consumption o left join novl_book b on o.book_id = b.id left join novl_chapter c on o.chapter_id = c.id left join novl_user u on o.user_id = u.id where o.user_id = #{userId} order by o.created_at desc
